game.name: Pomelo & Friends: Sevilla
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Pomelo and his friends have hidden away in sunny Seville! Explore five iconic hand-drawn locations and find 101 different dogs in this colorful hidden object game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pomelo and his friends have hidden away in sunny Seville! Explore five iconic hand-drawn locations and find 101 different dogs in this colorful hidden object game.
